text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

The stage set could probably
look something like this.

Wow~
amazing~~~!

Hinana, this is exactly what I had in mind!
How did you know?

Well,
because it's the one Hinana drew.

I found the notebook
and left it out.

Oh! So that's where it was,
at Toru-senpai's house?

I'm so happy it turned
out just the way I hoped.

S-So, this means Hinana-chan thought of this...?
A-Amazing... I'm looking forward to it...!

Is there anything else
you want to do?

Um, well...!
I also have something I want to do...

I was thinking about what I could do...
and I came up with the idea of writing a letter.

Eh~?
Then you should've said it earlier~

But, I couldn't sing or dance,
so I thought I had to learn that first...

But I think
I finally got it during today's practice...!

It's a bit late,
but can I also suggest something...?
Of course.

Then take a look at this~!
Koito-chan

"What you can't do in the practice room,
you definitely can't do on stage."
...Didn't the dance teacher say something like that?

Uhh... W-Well,
there's nothing we can do about it now...!
